title: Bootstrap Toasts
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Push Notifications
Toasts are lightweight notifications designed to mimic the push notifications popularized by mobile operating systems.

### Structure
1. `.toast-container`: Wrapper for positioning (e.g., top-right).
2. `.toast`: The notification box.
3. `.toast-header`: Icon, title, time.
4. `.toast-body`: Message.

### Behavior
Toasts are hidden by default. You must show them via JS or use class `.show`.

examples.code:
Bootstrap 11 mins ago
Hello, world! This is a toast message.

common_mistakes.correction: Default delay is 5000ms. Set `data-bs-autohide="false"` to keep it open.

real_world_use_cases.description: User clicks Save -> Toast appears 'Settings Saved' -> Disappears.

summary: Toasts are the modern, non-intrusive way to alert users.
